name: Bike to Work Week Celebration
description:
Join us on Thursday, May 31st from 8am to 10am at the Mezzanine at SFU Surrey Campus!

Celebrate Bike to Work Week (May 28 - June 1) at the SFU Surrey Celebration Station.

Free refreshments, cycling info and a chance to win a free helmet!

Join at bikehub.ca!

name: Certificates in Management (SFU Surrey)
description:
SFU's Certificates in Management @ SFU Surrey
presented by Management and Professional Programs, Continuing Studies

Room 5360 SFU Surrey
Free with reservation

Master the management concepts and techniques you need to excel in business. Certification from SFU will prepare you for management positions, validate your qualifications, and position you for promotion.

This certificate is ideal for anyone who wants to become a better manager. Whether you‰Ûªre a recent graduate or mid-career, you‰Ûªll benefit from this program.

name: Diploma in Rehabilitation and Disability Management (SFU Surrey)
description:
SFU's Diploma in Rehabilitation and Disability Management @ SFU Surrey
presented by Management and Professional Programs, Continuing Studies

Room 5360 SFU Surrey
Free with reservation

This diploma is for health care, human resources, counselling, career development and social services professionals.

If you face the challenge of making accommodations for people with disabilities, if you need to understand the role of medical, psychological and ergonomic assessments, or if you are tasked with making decisions in the return-to-work process, this program is for you.

name: Career Development Practitioner Certificate (SFU Surrey)
description:
SFU's Career Development Practitioner Certificate @ SFU Surrey
presented by Management and Professional Programs, Continuing Studies

Room 5360 SFU Surrey
Free with reservation

If you want a career in employment counselling or career development, this program is a perfect foundation. 

It‰Ûªs also ideal for experienced employment service personnel who want professional certification or a promotion.

Our Career Development Practitioner Certificate will prepare you to facilitate, implement, and plan career development programs for clients.

name: Diploma in Applied Project Management (SFU Surrey)
description:
SFU's Diploma in Applied Project Management @ SFU Surrey
presented by Management and Professional Programs, Continuing Studies

Room 5360 SFU Surrey
Free with reservation

This program uses an applied approach featuring group projects and real-life case studies, which makes it relevant to today‰Ûªs business environment. 

Whatever industry, sector, or organization you work in, if you want to improve your project management skills, this program will give you the edge you need.
